pageContext.claim: “We have auto plants being built all over the country. We went decades and no plant was built. No plant was even expanded.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often claims that car plants are being built in several swing states he would need to win reelection in 2020. Although some automakers have announced new plants or expansions in Michigan, Ohio and South Carolina, there's little or no evidence for the other swing states Trump mentions. It is not true that no plant has been built in decades or even expanded.
